channel.title: Rune-Kingdom - Looking for Programmers!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2qsqgcz.png[/img] I'm looking for programmers who has skills, good skills not some dip shit. You can contact me on Rune-King@hotmail.com [/CENTER]
[b]About[/b] Rune-Kingdom is totally rewritten out of Blank. We're also using a 317 Deob client. We will be based on the good old days! Skills, Quests, Mini games, Monsters, Bosses, PKing, all good and great stuff will get back, and will be improved!
[b]More will be added soon enough.[/b] [img]http://rune-kingdom.info/img/gif/clip0016.flv0001-new.gif[/img] [img]http://rune-kingdom.info/img/gif/clip0016.flv0002-new.gif[/img]
If u don't want to contact me on msn just leave a apply in this form here.
[code] Name: Age: E-mail: Experience(In years): About:
What can you code?: [/code]
Thanks, Runeking.
Faggot list(Haters, will be hated - Don't flame, thanks):
SunSpec221, SeMpErUs

item.title: Rune-Kingdom - Looking for Programmers!
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

I know, i’m on your side buddy.

The other people think Noobscape is shit source, i agree though you can change it.

Good luck with the blank source.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Kingdom - Looking for Programmers!
item.dc:creator: @Creazy_pk3r Creazy pk3r
item.description:
@Creazy_pk3r wrote:

[quote=“SunSpec221, post:20, topic:371042”]Noobscape can be coded into a better source.

You can change anyone’s base source.

BTW most sources were based off Delta.[/quote]

^This…

  1. I don’t know a thing of “Noobscape”
  2. This isn’t a Delta based server or shit, I have written it out of blank.

[quote=“the wanderer, post:17, topic:371042”][quote]About
Rune-Kingdom is totally rewritten out of Blank. We’re also using a 317 Deob client.

Images of Rune-Kingdom for you a good way how good / far we are.(We currently written a new source out of blank, images below will be imported later in the server.[/quote]
Sounds to me like the images aren’t updated. To me it sounds like he was using that source right there, but he switched to a blank source. Also please show some proof before you make some accusations. And write your accusations more clearly so others can understand what you are talking about.[/quote]

Ill update this thread right now, also that “Source” was Emulous 1.7 you can download it anywhere but you will see it doesn’t have the things that the images shows you.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Kingdom - Looking for Programmers!
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

Noobscape can be coded into a better source.

You can change anyone’s base source.

BTW most sources were based off Delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Kingdom - Looking for Programmers!
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“SeMpErUs, post:15, topic:371042”][quote author=the wanderer link=topic=467131.msg3429833#msg3429833 date=1292231519]

Looks like noobscape…

I’m saying he is a leech.

PS, Your birth certificate was an apology note from the condom factory…

@SeMpErUs - My server isn’t like yours gtfo of this topic, I’ve written a server out of Blank…i forgot to upgrade this thread.

Listen mate GTFO = get the fuck off so i dont think i can get the fuck off of your topic

PS i dont have a fucking server you crack head.

This is the reason why Mopar is looked down upon by most other RuneScape Private Server communities. Because of people like SeMpErUs who display the intellectual capabilities of a child at the age of thirteen who is prepubescent. Why would he be wanting a development team if he was leeching another source? And what Creazy pk3r meant was that his server isn’t like the server that you named…
[/quote]
lol and what server would that be?[/quote]
Dude, go away, NoobScape was horribly coded anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Kingdom - Looking for Programmers!
item.dc:creator: @TeleDepth TeleDepth
item.description:
@TeleDepth wrote:

Name: Ben
Age: 14
E-mail: ilikebacon@live.co.uk
Experience(In years): 2
About: I have been heavily coding C# and Java for 2 years and have been involved with RSPS for over a year. Although I am new to MoparScape I am a very good coder.

What can you code?: Server, client, web site anything really.

item.title: Rune-Kingdom - Looking for Programmers!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

You said his server was a leech of noobscape. How can it be a leech of noobscape when he is developing his own server? At the least it is based off of noobscape. I believe the definition of a leech is as stated:

A leech is when someone takes someone’s work and claims it as their own without making any modifications to the original work.

Read full topic
